name: biaxially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves two axes (= real or imaginary straight lines going through the centre of a object that is spinning, or lines that divide a shape into two equal halves) and especially one running from left to right and the other up and down: biaxially orientated polypropylene The layout is biaxially symmetrical. Related word
biaxial
More examplesFewer examplesThe polymer is biaxially oriented, which helps it maintain its tensile strength and durability. An electromagnetic inkjet printing system was used to deposit ink onto a buffered, biaxially textured substrate.
